Comment: I encourage stronger emission standards. Multnomah County, which includes Portland, has the 4th highest level of diesel soot of all US counties, and more than Los Angeles County, and the State of Oregon has the 6th highest levels among all 50 states. This is because environmental laws are so lax throughout the state. Old trucks, unacceptable in other states, are allowed to operate here. As vehicle traffic increases, this will only worse.
